MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl affecting properties in Trem Y Dyffryn. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the underground cable network , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:07pm on the 15th January 2021.
